START_DESC: MyInsurBox is your data scientist in Big Data, helping you uncover every sales opportunity!
WELCOME_BODY:
MyInsurBox aims at providing you a useful and affordable big data analytics service on individual level, assisting you to become a professional financial consultant in the age of Big Data.

Through AI technology, MyInsurBox helps you analyse your customerâ€™s activity data from social media and convert it into your golden sales opportunities.
